item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Maybe they know what I know, that the true way to a man's heart is six inches of metal between his ribs. Sometimes four inches will do the job, but to be really sure, I like to have six." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Still it might be nice, once in a while, not to have to choose between evils. Just once, couldn't I choose the lesser good?" -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Friends don't count the cost of favors." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Jeff Lindsay
item.description: "Mutilated corpses with a chance of afternoon showers. I got dressed and went to work. " -- Jeff Lindsay

item.title: Yvonne add a quote by Jeff Lindsay
item.description: "What to wear? I could think of no guidelines on what we were wearing this season to a party forced on you to celebrate an unwanted engagement that might turn into a violent confrontation with a vengeful maniac. Clearly brown shoes were out, but beyond that nothing really seemed de rigueur." -- Jeff Lindsay
